participant_1.name: Mary
participant_1.personality: Friendly and compassionate, enjoys volunteering and helping animals.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Steve
participant_2.personality: Shy but friendly, enjoys engaging in conversations and has a creative side as a stunt double.
participant_2.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.
